title: A simplified mass-spec data reader
text: simplified mass-spec data reader creates standardized data object use among tidyproteomics packages.

title: A simplified mass-spec data reader
text: install, open R type: … also install GitHub dependencies … also install Bioconductor dependencies

title: A simplified mass-spec data reader
text: simple get started, just point read_spectra() function downloaded MGF mzML file save object. Examine contents Plot TIC  Plot XIC  Plot MS1 heatmap
code: library(msreadr) mzml <- path_to_example() |> read_spectra() mzml ##   ## ── MS SPECTRA data object ──  ##   ## Memory               87.99 MB  ## MS1 Scans            900  ##   LC time            0.12 - 2218.76 (sec)  ##   ~ FTMS + p NSI Full ms [375.0000-1200.0000]   ## MS2 Scans            15024  ##   LC time            0.65 - 2220.23 (sec)  ##   precursors         374.67 - 1196.97 (mz)  ## mzml |> plot() mzml |> plot(mz = 456.5, mz_tolerance = .5) mzml |> plot(type = '3D', bins = 256)

title: A simplified mass-spec data reader
text: Check related packages mspredictr

title: Read and ms2 spectra file — read_spectra
code: # read in the data data <- path_to_example() |> read_spectra() #> ℹ Parsing mzML file example.ms2.mzML #> Warning: mzR has been built against a different Rcpp version (1.0.11) #> than is installed on your system (1.0.12). This might lead to errors #> when loading mzR. If you encounter such issues, please send a report, #> including the output of sessionInfo() to the Bioc support forum at  #> https://support.bioconductor.org/. For details see also #> https://github.com/sneumann/mzR/wiki/mzR-Rcpp-compiler-linker-issue. #> ✔ Parsing mzML file example.ms2.mzML [280ms] #>   # print the data object data #>  #> ── MS SPECTRA data object ── #>  #> Memory               39.02 kB  #> MS2 Scans            8  #>   LC time            0.29 - 0.92 (sec)  #>   precursors         378.19 - 506.76 (mz)  #>

title: Create a data subset — subset.msNspectra
code: # creates a subset of just of spectra data <- path_to_example() |> read_spectra() #> ℹ Parsing mzML file example.ms2.mzML #> ✔ Parsing mzML file example.ms2.mzML [14ms] #>   data |> print() #> ── MS SPECTRA data object ── #>  #> Memory               39.02 kB  #> MS2 Scans            8  #>   LC time            0.29 - 0.92 (sec)  #>   precursors         378.19 - 506.76 (mz)  #>                         data |> subset(ms_event == 3) #> ℹ Subsetting data: ms_event == 3 #> ℹ .. found 1 spectra #> ℹ Subsetting data: ms_event == 3  #> ✔ Subsetting data: ms_event == 3 [14ms] #>  #>  #> ── MS SPECTRA data object ── #>  #> Memory               7.73 kB  #> MS2 Scans            1  #>   LC time            0.45 - 0.45 (sec)  #>   precursors         422.75 - 422.75 (mz)  #>                         data |> subset(precursor_mz > 400) #> ℹ Subsetting data: precursor_mz > 400 #> ℹ .. found 5 spectra #> ℹ Subsetting data: precursor_mz > 400  #> ✔ Subsetting data: precursor_mz > 400 [13ms] #>  #>  #> ── MS SPECTRA data object ── #>  #> Memory               24.09 kB  #> MS2 Scans            5  #>   LC time            0.29 - 0.92 (sec)  #>   precursors         414.71 - 506.76 (mz)  #>

code: # creates a subset of just of spectra data <- path_to_example() |> read_spectra() #> ℹ Parsing mzML file example.ms2.mzML #> ✔ Parsing mzML file example.ms2.mzML [17ms] #>   data |> print() #> ── MS SPECTRA data object ── #>  #> Memory               39.02 kB  #> MS2 Scans            8  #>   LC time            0.29 - 0.92 (sec)  #>   precursors         378.19 - 506.76 (mz)  #>                         data |> subset(ms_event == 3) #> ℹ Subsetting data: ms_event == 3 #> ℹ .. found 1 spectra #> ℹ Subsetting data: ms_event == 3 #> ✔ Subsetting data: ms_event == 3 [17ms] #>  #>  #> ── MS SPECTRA data object ── #>  #> Memory               7.73 kB  #> MS2 Scans            1  #>   LC time            0.45 - 0.45 (sec)  #>   precursors         422.75 - 422.75 (mz)  #>                         data |> subset(precursor_mz > 400) #> ℹ Subsetting data: precursor_mz > 400 #> ℹ .. found 5 spectra #> ℹ Subsetting data: precursor_mz > 400 #> ✔ Subsetting data: precursor_mz > 400 [16ms] #>  #>  #> ── MS SPECTRA data object ── #>  #> Memory               24.09 kB  #> MS2 Scans            5  #>   LC time            0.29 - 0.92 (sec)  #>   precursors         414.71 - 506.76 (mz)  #>
